title: $:/plugins/tobibeer/join
description: A filter to join titles via template, separator, prefix, suffix, trimmed
author: Tobias Beer
text:
{
    "tiddlers": {
        "$:/plugins/tobibeer/join/filter.js": {
            "text": "/*\
title: $:/plugins/tobibeer/join/filter.js
type: application/javascript
module-type: filteroperator

A filter to seamlessly join input titles

@preserve
\*/
(function(){"use strict";exports.join=function(e,i,t){var r={sep:"",prefix:"",suffix:"",trim:0,template:"%title%"},s=[],n=/\%title\%/gim,o=/^\s*([\$\w\d\-\_\/]*):((?:.|[\r\n])*)/;$tw.utils.each((i.operand||"").split("\\"),function(e){var i;if(e.trim()!==""){i=o.exec(e);if(i){switch(i[1].toLowerCase()){case"trim":r.trim=(i[2]||"").trim()==="each"?2:1;break;case"sep":case"prefix":case"suffix":r[i[1].toLowerCase()]=i[2];break;default:console.log("tobibeer/join: unknown option in operand: ",i[1])}}else{r.template=e}}});e(function(e,i){var t=r.template.replace(n,r.trim===2?i.trim():i);if(r.trim===2){t=t.trim()}s.push(t)});s=s.join(r.sep);if(r.trim){s=s.trim()}s=r.prefix+s+r.suffix;return[s]}})();",
            "title": "$:/plugins/tobibeer/join/filter.js",
            "type": "application/javascript",
            "module-type": "filteroperator"
        },
        "$:/plugins/tobibeer/join/readme": {
            "title": "$:/plugins/tobibeer/join/readme",
            "text": "The plugin $:/plugins/tobibeer/join provides:

; join[]
: a filter to join input titles into one string
: allowing prefixes, suffixes, separators or to trim titles or result

!! Syntax

`[join[<item-template>\<option>:<option-value>]]`

Specify an item template for the ''join[]'' filter, as well as further options as `key:value`.

* `[join[]]` — simply join input titles
* `[join[<pre>%title%<post>]]` — join via item template
* `[join[sep:- ]]` — join with separator `- `
* `[join[trim:result]]` — trim end result
* `[join[trim:each]]` — trim each input title
* `[join[prefix:+]]` — final prefix
* `[join[suffix:+]]` — final suffix
* `[join[pre-%tile%\trim:each\prefix:ok:\sep:+]]` — combine options

; documentation / examples / demos...
: http://tobibeer.github.io/tw5-plugins#join"
        }
    }
}
